decks.notes: This deck focuses on fast-paced, aggressive strategies using creatures and spells in a Rakdos color combination. The key concept revolves around dealing damage quickly, controlling the board with removal spells like Fatal Push and Thoughtseize, and utilizing powerful creatures like Sheoldred, the Apocalypse and Kalitas, Traitor of Ghet to maintain pressure on the opponent. The deck also includes cards like Fable of the Mirror-Breaker and Bloodtithe Harvester to generate additional value and advantage. The goal is to overwhelm the opponent and secure victory through efficient creatures and removal spells.

The deck focuses on utilizing Lotus Field as a key combo piece to generate a large amount of mana quickly. It includes cards like Sylvan Scrying and Thespian's Stage to find and copy Lotus Field, as well as Vizier of Tumbling Sands to untap it. The deck also includes various spells to dig through the deck and find combo pieces like Hidden Strings and Pore Over the Pages. The goal is to assemble the combo quickly and overwhelm the opponent with powerful spells and abilities.

The main focus of this deck is to control the game through disruption and removal spells, while also generating value through cards like Waste Not and Geier Reach Sanitarium. The deck aims to strip the opponent's hand with cards like Thoughtseize and Duress, while also answering threats on the board with removal spells like Fatal Push and Heartless Act. The inclusion of Liliana of the Veil and Sheoldred, the Apocalypse provides additional ways to control the game and grind out advantages over time. The deck's mana base is designed to provide consistency and support the main strategy of controlling the opponent's resources.

This deck focuses on utilizing low-cost spirit creatures with disruptive abilities to apply early pressure on the opponent. By playing efficient creatures like Mausoleum Wanderer and Spell Queller, combined with cards like Wedding Announcement to generate additional creatures, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent quickly. Additionally, the inclusion of cards like Supreme Phantom and Hengegate Pathway work to boost the power and resilience of the spirit creatures in order to maintain a constant offensive presence on the battlefield.
